name: PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH OF CHESTNUT HILL, Respondent v. Rev. Dr. Sandra M. THOMAS, Petitioner

parties: PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH OF CHESTNUT HILL, Respondent v. Rev. Dr. Sandra M. THOMAS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2014, the Emergency Motion to Seal the Record is hereby GRANTED and the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
106 A.3d 669
PRESBYTERIAN CHURCH OF CHESTNUT HILL, Respondent v. Rev. Dr. Sandra M. THOMAS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2014.
